        The 'ke-an' form in the word 'keagungan' in sentence (5) has the same meaning as the 'ke-an' form in
\( \cdots \)
\( \rightarrow \) The word 'keagungan' means ' \( n \) glory; greatness'
\( \rightarrow \) Analysis
(A) Please wait for us at the arrival gate \( \rightarrow-> \) ' \( n \) matter of arrival'
(B) Hasan accidentally fell asleep when the game started...\( > \) ' \( v \) inadvertently sleep'
(C) Majapahit was a great kingdom in its time \( \ldots>{ }^{\prime} n \) the reign of a king'
(D) Many of our brothers are still starving in the village..\( >41 n \) about hunger; \( 2 v \) suffering from hunger (km no food): \( 3 n \) lack of food'
(E) We all aspire for the prosperity of this nation \( \ldots>^{\prime} n \) prosperous state'
\( \rightarrow \) Looking at the formation process, agung (adj.)--->keagungan (N), there are two words that have similarities, namely 'kelaparan' and 'kemakmuran'. However, in sentence (D), the word 'kelaparan' is a verb because it means suffering from hunger ( \( \mathrm{km} \) no food).
\( \rightarrow \) So, the 'ke-an' form in the word 'keagungan' in sentence (5) has the same meaning as the 'ke-an' form in (E) We all aspire for the prosperity of this nation.

\( \cdots \)

\( \rightarrow \) Analisis
(A) Mohon tunggu kami di pintu kedatangan \( \rightarrow-> \) ' \( n \) hal datang/datangnya'
(B) Hasan malah ketiduran saat permainan mulai...\( > \) ' \( v \) tidak sengaja tidur'
(C) Majapahit adalah kerajaan besar pada masanya \( \ldots>{ }^{\prime} n \) wilayah kekuasaan seorang raja'
(D) Banyak saudara kita yang masih kelaparan di desa..\( >41 n \) perihal lapar; \( 2 v \) menderita lapar (km tidak ada yg dimakan): \( 3 n \) kekurangan makan'
(E) Kita semua mendambakan kemakmuran bangsa ini \( \ldots>^{\prime} n \) keadaan makmur'
\( \rightarrow \) Kalau dilihat dari proses pembentukannya, agung (adj.)--->keagungan (N), ada dua kata yang memiliki kesamaan, yakni kelaparan dan kemakmuran. Akan tetapi, pada kalimat (D), kata kelaparan berupa verba karena bermakna menderita lapar ( \( \mathrm{km} \) tidak ada yang dimakan).
\( \rightarrow \) Jadi, bentuk ke-an pada kata keagungan dalam kalimat (5) mempunyai kesamaan makna dengan bentuk ke-an pada (E) Kita semua mendambakan kemakmuran bangsa ini.

content:
Nowadays, our lives are practically dependent on the ubiquity of Information Communications Technology (ICT). Data from the Communications and Information Ministry shows that internet users in Indonesia increased from 74 million people in 2013 to 111 million in 2014. In Indonesia, Internet burst has been mainly used for accessing social media. Indonesia ranked third among countries with the highest number of Facebook users, below the US and India.

The popularity of the Internet and social media unfortunately has not extended to the education sector. ICT has not become a backbone of improving the country's competitiveness through education. The Ministry of Education and Culture recorded that only about 50 percent of the 234,919 primary and secondary schools in Indonesia had access to the Internet in mid2014.

Advancement of ICT should ideally be able to revolutionize education. Technology brings new sources of learning beyond teachers. Moreover, the divide between students and subjects is further narrowed by the availability of educational content through ICT. A revolution in education is also possible through ICT, as students can learn at the appropriate speed according to their capacity. Interactive digital content allows students to pick particular topics that they want to explore more. In a nutshell, there is a democratization of the learning process.

Unfortunately, it is still a long road to revolutionize education in Indonesia through ICT. In addition to building technology infrastructure across the country's islands, ICT literacy for teachers, parents and students is also of importance. Without it, we are constrained from reaping the full benefits of ICT in education. Technology (ICT). In addition to building technology infrastructure across the country's islands, ICT literacy for teachers, parents and students is also of importance. Without it, we are constrained from reaping the full benefits of ICT in education.

answer:
The 'ke-an' form in the word 'keagungan' in sentence (5) has a similar meaning to the 'ke-an' form in 
\( \rightarrow \)
\( \rightarrow \) The word 'keagungan' means ' \( n \) glory; greatness'

However, in sentence (D), the word hunger is a verb because it means suffering from hunger ( \( \mathrm{km} \) there's nothing to eat).

"Masyarakat sekitar percaya bahwa Pangeran Gunadharma tertidur abadi di selatan candi dengan membentuk rangkaian Pegunungan Menoreh dan terjaganya hasil rancangannya. \( { }^{5} \) Deretan gunung ini terlihat seperti seseorang yang berbaring dengan mahkota keagungan. \( { }^{6} \) Menorah tersusun atas deretan beberapa gunung api purba. \( { }^{7} \mathrm{Di} \) kawasan ini, dapat ditemui beberapa gunung api purba yang bagian bekas dapur magmanya terangkat ke permukaan, misalnya Gunung ljo, Gunung Gajah, dan Gunung Ayamayam. \( { }^{8} \) Terletak di bagian tengah deretan, gunung api tertua adalah dari jajaran Pegunungan Menoreh. 'Deretan yang kemudian terbentuk adalah Gunung Ayamayam, Gunung Gajah, dan beberapa yang terletak di bagian selatannya.

Kelompok kata dengan membentuk rangkaian Pegunungan Menoreh dan terjaganya hasil rancangannya dalam kalimat (4) dapat diperbaiki menjadi ....
answer:
The group of words that form the Menoreh mountain range and the preservation of its design in sentence (4) can be corrected to ....
\( \rightarrow \) There is an incongruity in the group of words, namely the word "forming" (active verb) is not parallel with "its preservation" (passive verb). Thus, the second form (passive) should be changed to active.
\( \rightarrow \) Therefore, the group of words forming the Menoreh mountain range and its preservation in sentence (4) can be corrected to (B) by forming the Menoreh mountain range and preserving its design.
raw_answer:
Kelompok kata dengan membentuk rangkaian Pegunungan Menoreh dan terjaganya hasil rancangannya dalam kalimat (4) dapat diperbaiki menjadi ....
\( \rightarrow \) Pada kelompok kata tersebut terdapat ketidaksejajaran bentuk, yakni kata membentuk (verba aktif) tidak sejajar dengan terjaganya (verba pasif). Jadi, bentuk yang kedua (pasif) seharusnya diubah menjadi aktif.
\( \rightarrow \) Jadi, kelompok kata dengan membentuk rangkaian Pegumingan Menoreh dan terjaganya hasil rancangannya dalam kalimat (4) dapat diperbaiki menjadi (B) dengan membentuk rangkaian Pegunungan Menoreh dan menjaga hasil rancangannya.

Gagasan dalam kalimat (2) dapat diungkapkan kembali dengan kalimat .....
answer:
The idea in sentence (2) can be rephrased as .....
\( \rightarrow{ }^{2} \) A person with a healthy mind can think positively, be sociable, and be liked by peers.
\( \rightarrow \) In that second sentence, the word can indicates that thinking positively, being sociable, and being liked by peers is something that is definitely present in people with a healthy mind.
\( \rightarrow \) So, sentence (2) can be rephrased as (B) Thinking positively, communicating better, being easy to befriend, and being liked by peers can form mental health.
raw_answer:

\( \rightarrow{ }^{2} \) Orang dengan mental yang sehat bisa berpikir positif, mudah bergaul, dan disenangi rekan sejawat.
\( \rightarrow \) Pada kalimat kedua tersebut, kata bisa menunjukkan bahwa berpikir positif, mudah bergaul, dan disenangi rekan sejawat merupakan sesuatu yang pasti ada pada orang dengan mental sehat.
\( \rightarrow \) Jadi, kalimat (2) dapat diungkapkan kembali dengan kalimat (B) Berpikir positif, berkomunikasi lebih baik, mudah berteman, dan disenangi rekan sejawat dapat membentuk kesehatan mental.

content:
Siswa menulis puisi -- \( \mathrm{S} \) witreu povh-eun cgrae
Guru membaca materi -- W sitreu povh-eum ptyce
Puisi tidak dibaca guru -- W sitreu povh-eum-na cgrea
Bagaimana cara mengatakan "Materi tidak ditulis siswa" dengan menggunakan Bahasa tersebut?
answer:
Present to me the latex version by using Mathpix latex if there's any latex involved.
If the text is in Bahasa Indonesia, use Bahasa Indonesia for the rewrite, and if it's in English, use English. 
Just provide the answer, no other text is necessary.
Student writes a poem -- \( \mathrm{S} \) witreu povh-eun cgrae
Teacher reads the material - W sitreu povh-eum ptyce
The poem is not read by the teacher - W sitreu povh-eum-na cgrea
How to say "The material is not written by the student" in that language?
\( \rightarrow \) Meaning of each word
\begin{tabular}{ll} 
Student & 'S witreu', \\
Writes & 'povh-eun' \\
Poem & 'cgrae' \\
Teacher & 'W sitreu' \\
Reads & 'povh-eum' \\
Material & 'ptyce' \\
Not read & 'povh-eum-na'
\end{tabular}
\( \rightarrow \) To say "The material is not written by the student", we need to look at the meaning of each word. Material is 'ptyce', not written is 'povh-eun-na', and student is 'S witreu'.
\( \rightarrow \) Hence, to say "The material is not written by the student" in that language would be (B) S witreu pvoh-eun-na ptyce.
raw_answer:
Siswa menulis puisi -- \( \mathrm{S} \) witreu povh-eun cgrae
Guru membaca materi - W sitreu povh-eum ptyce
Puisi tidak dibaca guru - W sitreu povh-eum-na cgrea
Bagaimana cara mengatakan "Materi tidak ditulis siswa" dengan menggunakan Bahasa tersebut?
\( \rightarrow \) Makna per kata
\begin{tabular}{ll} 
Siswa & 'S witreu', \\
Menulis & 'povh-eun' \\
Puisi & 'cgrae' \\
Guru & 'W sitreu' \\
Membaca & 'povh-eum' \\
Materi & 'ptyce' \\
Tidak dibaca & 'povh-eum-na'
\end{tabular}
\( \rightarrow \) Untuk mengatakan "Materi tidak ditulis siswa" kita lihat makna per katanya. Materi 'ptyce', tidak ditulis 'povh-eun-na', siswa 'S witreu'.
\( \rightarrow \) Jadi, mengatakan "Materi tidak ditulis siswa" dengan menggunakan bahasa tersebut adalah (B) S witreu pvoh-eun-na ptyce

content: Suatu proyek dapat dikerjakan selama p hari, dengan biaya setiap harinya \( \left(4 p+\frac{1500}{p}-40\right) \) juta rupiah. Jika biaya minimum proyek tersebut adalah \( R \) juta rupiah, maka \( R=\ldots \).
answer:
The cost over \( p \) days is given by
\[
B=p\left(4 p+\frac{1500}{p}-40\right)=4 p^{2}-40 p+1500
\]

The condition for minimum cost is \( B^{\prime}=0 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
B^{\prime}=8 p-40=0 \\
p=5
\end{array}
\]

So the minimum cost occurs when \( p=5 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
B=4 p^{2}-40 p+1500 \\
B=4(5)^{2}-40(5)+1500=1400
\end{array}
\]
raw_answer:
Biaya selama \( p \) hari adalah
\[
B=p\left(4 p+\frac{1500}{p}-40\right)=4 p^{2}-40 p+1500
\]

Syarat biaya minimum adalah \( B^{\prime}=0 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
B^{\prime}=8 p-40=0 \\
p=5
\end{array}
\]

Jadi biaya minimum terjadi saat \( p=5 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
B=4 p^{2}-40 p+1500 \\
B=4(5)^{2}-40(5)+1500=1400
\end{array}
\]

content: Diketahui fungsi-fungsi \( f \) dan \( g \) dengan \( f(x) g(x)=x^{2}-3 x \) untuk setiap bilangan real \( x \). Jika \( g(1)=2 \), dan \( f^{\prime}(1)=f(1)=-1 \), maka \( g^{\prime}(1)=\cdots \)
answer:
Given:
\[
\begin{array}{l}
g(1)=2 \\
f^{\prime}(1)=f(1)=-1 \\
f(x) g(x)=x^{2}-3 x \\
\text { Differentiate } \\
f^{\prime}(x) g(x)+g^{\prime}(x) f(x)=2 x-3 \\
\text { For } x=1 \\
f^{\prime}(1) g(1)+g^{\prime}(1) f(1)=2(1)-3 \\
(-1)(2)+g^{\prime}(1)(-1)=-1 \\
g^{\prime}(1)=-1
\end{array}
\]

Paraphrased version:
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\text{Given:}\\
\text{The value of } g(1) \text{ is 2.}\\
\text{The derivative of } f \text{ at } x=1 \text{ is equal to the value of } f(1) \text{ which is -1.}\\
\text{The product of } f(x) \text{ and } g(x) \text{ is equal to } x^{2}-3x.}\\
\text{After differentiating, we have:}\\
\text{The derivative of } f(x) \text{ multiplied by } g(x) \text{ plus the derivative of } g(x) \text{ multiplied by } f(x) \text{ is equal to } 2x-3.}\\
\text{Substituting } x=1 \text{ into the equation:}\\
\text{The derivative of } f(1) \text{ multiplied by } g(1) \text{ plus the derivative of } g(1) \text{ multiplied by } f(1) \text{ is equal to } 2(1)-3.}\\
\text{Simplifying the equation:}\\
\text{(-1)(2) plus the derivative of } g(1) \text{ multiplied by } (-1) \text{ is equal to } -1.}\\
\text{Therefore, the derivative of } g(x) \text{ at } x=1 \text{ is equal to } -1.\\
\end{array}
\]

Answer: \(\frac{{d}}{{dx}}g(x)\bigg|_{x=1}=-1\)
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
\[
\begin{array}{l}
g(1)=2 \\
f^{\prime}(1)=f(1)=-1 \\
f(x) g(x)=x^{2}-3 x \\
\text { Diturunkan } \\
f^{\prime}(x) g(x)+g^{\prime}(x) f(x)=2 x-3 \\
\text { Untuk } x=1 \\
f^{\prime}(1) g(1)+g^{\prime}(1) f(1)=2(1)-3 \\
(-1)(2)+g^{\prime}(1)(-1)=-1 \\
g^{\prime}(1)=-1
\end{array}
\]

content: Jika \( (a, b) \) adalah titik minimum grafik fungsi \( f(x)=7-\sqrt{25-x^{2}} \), maka nilai \( a^{2}+b^{2} \) adalah ....
answer: \( \begin{array}{l}f(x)=7-\sqrt{25-x^{2}} \\ \text { Minimum condition } f^{\prime}(x)=0 \\ f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{x}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}=0 \\ x=0 \\ f(0)=7-\sqrt{25-0^{2}}=2 \\ \text { Therefore } a=0 \text { and } b=2 \\ a^{2}+b^{2}=0^{2}+2^{2}=4\end{array} \)
raw_answer: \( \begin{array}{l}f(x)=7-\sqrt{25-x^{2}} \\ \text { Syarat minimum } f^{\prime}(x)=0 \\ f^{\prime}(x)=\frac{x}{\sqrt{25-x^{2}}}=0 \\ x=0 \\ f(0)=7-\sqrt{25-0^{2}}=2 \\ \text { Jadi } a=0 \text { dan } b=2 \\ a^{2}+b^{2}=0^{2}+2^{2}=4\end{array} \)

content:
Generally, by people's own accounts, the public idea of women at home is that they are dull and boring. And the stereotype of a working woman is of hard, ambitious, selfish creatures. It is not just that you are either gentle and dull or selfish and interesting. It is that you are either a good mother or you are an interesting woman.
'Young women now seem to get a very clear picture that they have got a choice. If they are going to do mothering well, they have got to pay for it by not being interesting women. If you are an interesting working woman, you are a bad mother.' Lyn Richards puts the blame for such notions and for resulting family tensions on the failure of people to talk enough about them. The media, too, are guilty. 'There is a lot of media coverage of successful career women and stills a lot, especially in women's magazines, on the joys of motherhood. There's not that much about the trouble of either role and precious little about combining the roles. Yet half the women who are married in our society are working.'

Nor is much thought given to the task of loosening the ties entrapping men. Lyn Richards, a working mother, grateful for the privilege of genuinely choosing and being able to afford the role, criticizes the systematic exclusion of men from 'child rearing and the really pretty fabulous aspects of having children'. She condemns as ludicrous the idea of the 9 to 5 treadmili of work as an absolute duty for men. 'The sheer irony to me is that the women's movement has told women the way to be liberated is to get into the 9 to 5 tied work force that men have been fighting against for a century. Really we should be using changes in women's values to shake up all the oppression and rigidity that men have been under.'

Indeed, there has been a change. 'The new thing since I married is that it's normal for both husband and wife to go on working when they marry. Now marriage isn't a particularly big deal. Very often it just legalizes something which has been going on anyway and it certainly doesn't change a woman's whole basis of life, her notion of who she is. The real life change is having the first child and when that happens, I think that probably most couples are still reverting to something like the traditional concept of marriage. But the longer people put off having a child the more likely it is that they won't because they have set up a viable life style. They don't need to have kids now to have a good marriage.'
Not that motherhood and raising families are wholly going out of fashion but rather that people are having smaller families. Consequently, the period in a woman's life when she is not required to devote herself to mothering is lengthening. 'Motherhood - the mother role - just isn't a very good identity base today,' Lyn Richards says. 'Motherhood is a short-term appointment now. It doesn't last long.'

The expression combining the roles in :... preciouslittle about combining the roles." (paragraph 2 ) in the passage means ....
answer: The statement "combining the roles" implies merging two roles, that of a mother and a career woman. This conclusion can be drawn from the previous sentence stating that there is extensive media coverage of successful career women who also relish their role as mothers; 'There's a significant media attention on successful career women and a lot about the joy of mothering, particularly in women's magazines. However, there's little content on the challenges of both roles and even less on the concept of merging these roles...
raw_answer: Pernyataan combining the roles (menggabungkan peran-peran) berarti mengombinasi dua peran, yaitu sebagai seorang ibu dan wanita karir. Kesimpulan tersebut dapat diambil dari kalimat sebelumnya bahwa ada banyak media yang meliput mengenai wanita karir sukses yang juga menikmati peran sebagai seorang ibu; 'There is a lot of media coverage of successful career women and still a lot, especially in women's magazines, on the joys of motherhood. There's not that much about the trouble of either role and precious little about combining the roles...

content:
There have been numerous attempts to classify consumer responses to different individual colours: ... but the truth of the matter is that colour is too dependent on personal experiences to be universally translated to specific feelings. But there are broader messaging patterns to be found in colour perceptions. For instance, colours play a fairly substantial role in purchases and branding.

With regards to the role that colour plays in branding, results from studies such as The Interactive Effects of Colors show that the relationship between brands and colour center around on the perceived appropriateness of the colour being used for the particular brand. In other words, does the colour "fit" what is being sold?

The study Exciting Red and Competent Blue also confirms that purchasing intent is greatly affected by colours due to the impact they have on how a brand is perceived. This means that colours influence how consumers view the "personality" of the brand in question.

Additional studies have revealed our brains prefer immediately recognizable brands, which makes color important element when creating a brand identity. It has been suggested in Colour Research and Application that it is of paramount importance for new brands to specifically target logo colors that ensure differentiation from entrenched. When it comes to picking the "right" colour, research has found that predicting consumer reaction to colour appropriateness in relation to the product is far more important than the individual colour itself. So, if Harley owners buy the product in order to feel macho, you could assume that the pink and glitter edition would not sell all that well.

The word 'classify' in paragraph 1 best replaced by
answer:
Define: merumuskan Link: menyambungkan Relate: berhubungan Differentiate: memisahkan
Kata classify (mengklasifikasikan) di paragraf 1 dapat diganti dengan kata sort (mengurutkan).
raw_answer:
Kata classify (mengklasifikasikan) di paragraf 1 dapat diganti dengan kata categorize (mengategorikan).

Define: mendefinisikaan Link: mengaitkan Relate: menghubungkan Differentiate: membedakan

content:
Immediately following the online registration period and through the end of the second week of the fall and spring semesters, course additions may be made. This can be done if the student has the consent of his or her advisor or the instructor of the course. Students must turn in their add cards by the end of the second week of classes.

Students may not add a course after the deadline. Petitions for exceptions to this rule will be considered by the Administration Committee. If approved, a charge of \( \$ 50 \) per add will be assessed. A student may withdraw from a course without receiving a failing grade up to the end of the fifth week of the semester.

After the fifth week of classes, a student may ask the Administration Committee in writing to withdraw from a course for exceptional personal or medical reasons. The petition should be endorsed by the student's Commons dean. If permission is granted, the course will be removed from the student's transcript; if it is denied, the student will remain on the roster for that course. Withdrawals for other reasons are not permitted after the end of the fifth week. A student may also request the Administration Committee to correct the student's enrollment if the student provides written confirmation from the instructor that the student did not attend the class. If permission is granted, a charge of \( \$ 50 \) per dropped course will be assessed. A student who fails to complete the work of a course will receive a failing grade in that course.

The word "withdraw" in line 5 means ....
answer:
Provide me with the Mathpix latex version if any latex is present in the text. 
If the original text is in Indonesian, please paraphrase it in the same language, and do the same if it's in English. 
I only need the answer, without any additional text. 
According to the text, 'withdraw' means to resign, synonymous with the term 'drop out'. This is also indicated at the end of the third paragraph, which states '... \( \$ 50 \) for each course dropped...'

content:
The earth's crust is split into a number of tectonic plates that float on the hot magma liquid. The plates keep moving. This is called a tectonic plate, and the movement of the tectonic plate is the trigger for earthquakes.

Strong earthquakes occur when two tectonic plate collide with each other. As a result, the high tension arises at the edges of the two plates. The power continues to increase and it eventually reaches an optimal point. When that energy is released, an earthquake occurs.

There are also two plates that collide and squeeze each other in the coastal area of Japan. The edges of those tectonic plates are finally pressed to the earth. A curved plate infiltrates under another plate with a higher density. If the pressure caused by the collision of the tectonic plates is released suddenly, then a natural disaster occurs in the form of a huge earthquake.

The earthquake has also threatened the west coast of the United States. The two plates rub against an area called the San Andreas Fault. The length of the rubbing plate is about 1,000 kilometers. The resulting friction also causes collisions. The two plates are currently sliding past each other. Since the fault is formed from the sliding plates, a large tension is stored. The researchers estimate that the entire region is threatened by natural disasters that can occur at any time.

Tectonic plates on the surface of the earth always move dynamically so that earthquakes often occur at the edges of each plate. The most famous earthquake area is the Pacific fire ring, which stretches from Chile in South America across the eastern coast of North America, Japan, the Philippines, Indonesia to the Tonga islands. movement of the tectonic plate is the trigger for earthquakes.

Strong earthquakes occur when two tectonic plate collide with each other. As a result, the high tension arises at the edges of the two plates. The power continues to increase and it eventually reaches an optimal point. When that energy is released, an earthquake occurs.

There are also two plates that collide and squeeze each other in the coastal area of Japan. The edges of those tectonic plates are finally pressed to the earth. A curved plate infiltrates under another plate with a higher density. If the pressure caused by the collision of the tectonic plates is released suddenly, then a natural disaster occurs in the form of a huge earthquake.

The earthquake has also threatened the west coast of the United States. The two plates rub against an area called the San Andreas Fault. The length of the rubbing plate is about 1,000 kilometers. The resulting friction also causes collisions. The two plates are currently sliding past each other. Since the fault is formed from the sliding plates, a large tension is stored. The researchers estimate that the entire region is threatened by natural disasters that can occur at any time.

Tectonic plates on the surface of the earth always move dynamically so that earthquakes often occur at the edges of each plate. The most famous earthquake area is the Pacific fire ring, which stretches from Chile in South America across the eastern coast of North America, Japan, the Philippines, Indonesia to the Tonga islands.

The phrase 'move dynamically' in paragraph 5 can be replaced by ....
answer: The phrase 'move dynamically' means moving in a dynamic way. The word 'dynamic' implies being always active or constantly changing. Therefore, a phrase that can replace 'move dynamically' is 'actively change'.
raw_answer: Frasa move dynamically berarti bergerak secara dinamis. Kata dynamic berarti selalu aktif (active) atau berubah-ubah (changing). Maka frasa yang dapat menggantikan frasa move dynamically adalah change actively.

content: Jika \( p=2 b-2 \) dan \( q=a+1 \) dengan \( a>0 \) dan \( b>0 \), maka nilai \( p+2 q-2 \) adalah \( \ldots \).
answer:
Please provide me with the latex version using Mathpix latex if there are any latex elements present. 
Kindly use Indonesian language if the text is in Indonesian language and apply English if it's in English language. 
I just need the answer without any additional text.

\[
\begin{array}{l}
p=2 b-2 \text { and } q=a+1 \\
\begin{aligned}
p+2 q-2 & =2 b-2+2(a+1)-2 \\
& =2 b-2+2 a+2-2 \\
& =2(b+a)-2
\end{aligned}
\end{array}
\]

Since \( a, b>0 \), it follows that \( p+2 q-2>-2 \)

content:
Latin America, extending from the deserts of northern Mexico to the icy wilds of Tierra del Fuego in Chile and Argentina, encompasses many diverse countries and peoples. Though most of these countries are largely Catholic and Spanish-speaking, thanks to a shared history of colonization by Spain, they have at least as many differences as they do similarities with each other. In the United States the terms "Hispanic" and "Latino" (or "Latina" for a woman; sometimes written as "Latinx" to be gender-neutral) __ 17 _ in an attempt to loosely group immigrants and their descendants who hail from this part of the world. The terms are often used interchangeably, though the words can convey slightly different connotations. It is important
to clarify that the categories refer only to a person's origin and ancestry.

In general, "Latino" is understood as a shorthand for the Spanish word latino-americano and refers to anyone born in or with ancestors from Latin America and living in the U.S., Brazilians. "Latino" does not include speakers of Romance languages from Europe, such as Italians or Spaniards, and some people have argued that it excludes Spanish speakers from the Caribbean.

Although people from French Guiana are sometimes accepted as Latino since French shares linguistic roots with Spanish and Portuguese, there is much debate about whether people from English-speaking Belize and Guyana and Dutch-speaking Suriname truly fit under the category since their cultures and histories are so distinct.
"Hispanic" is that includes people only from Spanish-speaking Latin America, including those territories of the Caribbean or from Spain itself.

The phrase "shorthand for" in paragraph 2 means \( \ldots \)
answer: Generally, "Latino" is perceived as an abbreviation for the Spanish term latino-americano, indicating anyone born in or with familial roots from Latin America and residing in the U.S. Here, shorthand is used in the context of explaining the origin of the word "Latino".
raw_answer: "In general, "Latino" is understood as a shorthand for the Spanish word latino-americano and refers to anyone born in or with ancestors from Latin America and living in the U.S. " . Shorthand di sini memiliki konteks "menjelaskan dari mana asal muasal kata latino".

content:
In the highlands of Northern Thailand, there was once a truly isolated tribe They are known and famously called as phi (spirit/ghost) They lived deep in the forest, completely isolated from outsiders ..... And they leave behind their "windscreens" made of bana leaves.

These people call themselves Miaq Briq or Mlabri which means " forest human being in the Austroasiatic group of languages. They are one of the smallest ethnic groups in the world. For many years, the Mlabri were scattered throughout the forests, existing as nomadic hunter - gatherers. They hunted wild animals by spear and hand-spade and gathered wild plants and fruits.

Due to their traditional subsistence through hunting and gathering, the Mlabri are often considered "living fossils" -but this is an inaccurate characterisation. A recent genetic study found that the Mlabri were established about 500 to 800 years ago, from a very small number of individuals who engaged in agriculture.
Over three decades, significant social changes have taken place within the community, as a result of large-scale deforestation, which occurred at the end of World War II, along with a state-led policy, which has been conducted since the mid-1980s. Today, they lead sedentary lives, engaging in wage labour, cash crop cultivation, and ethnic tourism.

One could ask: How much would the world change without the Mlabri? An example will suffice to answer this question. The word " jealousy " does not exist in their language, which is to say that they have never been envious of others. Yet today, this is no longer the case. As they are integrated into That society under the banner of development, young Mlabri in particular have begun to understand the modern world and have started to express this feeling. They now have a measure to compare themselves with others. Thus, some Mlabri youths, aware that they are disadvantaged in all possible ways, are finding it increasingly difficult to see their position within Thai society in a positive light.

The word "isolated" in paragraph 1 is closest in meaning to ....
answer: Dalam kalimat "Mereka tinggal jauh di dalam hutan, benar-benar terisolasi dari orang luar", kata 'isolated' bisa diinterpretasikan sebagai 'terpisah'. Jadi, sinonim yang sesuai untuk kata tersebut adalah 'remote' (terpencil).
raw_answer: Kata isolated dalam kalimat They lived deep in the forest, completely isolated from outsiders dapat diartikan 'terasing', sehingga sinonim yang tepat untuk kata tersebut adalah remote (terpencil).

content:
Researchers found that parents and toodlers who read paper books together, speak and interact more when compared with those who read e-books. Reading with a child is a hugely important developmental activity. It helps youngsters learn new words. It will broaden their knowledge. It also provides time to bond with loved ones. So, scientists wanted to see if parents and children acted differently when they read books together using traditional media versus electronic devices like tablets.

The researchers recruited 37 pairs of parents and healthy toddlers between two and three years old. They asked them to read from three different types of media. These were enhanced electronic books with sound effects or animation, a basic electronic book, and a print book.

Researchers found parents and toodlers spoke more when interacting with a paper book rather than a story on an electronic tablet. Parents used richer language when using print books compared with tablets. They collaborated more with their children. But when reading e-books, parents were less responsive. Children were less engaged with their parents.

The word broaden in paragraph 1 means ...
answer:
Provide me with the Mathpix latex variant if any latex is present. 
If the provided text is in Bahasa Indonesia, please use the same language; if it's in English, use English. 
Simply provide the response, excluding all other text. 
The synonyms for "broaden" include expand, extend, widen, and enlarge. Hence, the correct answer is C.
raw_answer: Sinonim kata "broaden" adalah expand, extend, widen, enlarge. Jadi jawaban yang tepat adalah C.

content: Di antara bilangan berikut, manakah yang nilainya lebih besar dari \( \frac{1}{3} \times 20 \% \) ?
answer:
We are looking for a number that is greater than \( \frac{1}{3} \times 20 \% \). To simplify the calculation, let's remove the percentage value \( \frac{1}{3} \times 20=6 \), ...
A. \( \frac{1}{5} \times 24=4, \ldots \)
B. \( \frac{1}{6} \times 33=\frac{1}{2} \times 11=5, \ldots \)
C. \( \frac{1}{16} \times 90=\frac{1}{8} \times 45=5, \ldots \)
D. \( \frac{1}{4} \times 30=\frac{1}{2} \times 15=7, \ldots \)
E. \( \frac{1}{8} \times 42=\frac{1}{4} \times 21=5, \ldots \)

From the calculations above, it can be seen that option D has a value of 7 point something, which is clearly greater than 6 point something.
raw_answer:
Kita akan mencari bilangan yang lebih besar dari \( \frac{1}{3} \times 20 \% \). Untuk mempermudah perhitungan kita hilangkan nilai persennya saja \( \frac{1}{3} \times 20=6 \), ...
A. \( \frac{1}{5} \times 24=4, \ldots \)
B. \( \frac{1}{6} \times 33=\frac{1}{2} \times 11=5, \ldots \)
C. \( \frac{1}{16} \times 90=\frac{1}{8} \times 45=5, \ldots \)
D. \( \frac{1}{4} \times 30=\frac{1}{2} \times 15=7, \ldots \)
E. \( \frac{1}{8} \times 42=\frac{1}{4} \times 21=5, \ldots \)

Dari perhitungan di atas terlihat bahwa pilihan D bernilai 7 koma sekian yang jelas lebih besar dari 6 koma sekian.

content:
Fast food is widely knowns in most populated countries. Now, fast food has become part of urban people's life because it offers a delicious quick-meal at a small price. However, consuming fast food such as hot dog, hamburger, fried chicken, soft drink, and many others may frequently cause several bad impacts on your health.

In many countries, dieticians often emphasize the dangers of consuming too much fast food. Fast food is high ini in calories but they come from unhealthy fat and added sugars. Therefore, the food provides few nutrients. The imbalanced content from this kind of food may trigger various diseases. Obesity is one of the most possible impacts of consuming too much fast food. Besides, it can also increase the risk of hypertension, heart attack, as well as diabetes.

A study showed that children who consumed a lot fast food had lower IQ than children who ate less fast food. Although the difference was subtle, the study proved that fast food that children consumed at the age between 6 and 24 months gave a small but significant effect on their IQ when they reached 8 years old.

In addition, most fast food meals have the artificial additives and sweetener to maintain their texture consistency, to give them longer shelf-life, and also to enhance the flavor. These subtances contribute to the good taste of fast food.

Pregnant women should also avoid eating fast food. Eating such food is not only bad for the mother herself but also for the baby. The baby will be so vulnerable to hypertension and diabetes. Therefore, we should consult a doctor before consuming fast food. The cause is the preservatives in fast food that are harmful to both mother and her baby. Moreover, a number of studies in China have found that the rate of breast cancer among women has risen due to the consumption of fast food.

The author would apparently agree that the discussion of fast food and IQ in the text is similar to the phenomenon between ...
answer: Konsumsi makanan cepat saji adalah penyebab, dan penurunan IQ adalah efeknya. Ini setara dengan mengatakan bahwa konsumsi kafein adalah penyebab dan dampak kesehatan adalah efeknya. Oleh karena itu, jawaban yang benar adalah E.
raw_answer: Konsumsi fast food adalah sebab, penurunan IQ adalah akibat. Maka maknanya sama dengan konsumsi kafein adalah sebab, efek kesehatan adalah akibat. Jadi, jawaban yang tepat adalah E.

content:
Hypebeast is defined by Urban Dictionary as: "A kid that collects clothing, shoes, and accessories for the sole purpose of impressing others". Some people accept that hypebeast is a slang for someone who is a "beast" (or obsessed) about hyped-up fashion brands. Thus, they will enact whatever means to achieve that hype. The term has been attributed to (usually) welloff youths, who are obsessed in purchasing popular and high-end streetwear brands. They camp out overnight to await the next sneaker release from famous streetwear brands. On the other hand, they ignore brands that haven't been hyped up online. They also constantly show off their sneaker and snapback collections.

These people spend much of their time curating their social media image by projecting to certain lifestyle. They love to post pictures of their outfits of the day, or OOTD, and count the likes. However, it's commonly considered as an insult to be called a hypebeast, because it is generally the urban version of a "social climber".

content: Pemilihan petugas upacara dipilih secara acak dari dua belas paskibraka yang berasal dari tiga daerah yang berbeda yaitu tiga orang dari Bandung, empat orang dari Jakarta dan lima orang dari Surabaya. Manakah kondisi berikut yang paling mungkin terjadi jika dipilih dua orang petugas upacara?
answer:
Utilize the probability concept to figure out the possible outcomes.

Option \( \mathbf{A}: P(B B)=\frac{C_{2}^{3}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{3}{66} \)
Option B : \( P(J J)=\frac{C_{2}^{4}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{6}{66} \)
Option C : \( P(S S)=\frac{C_{2}^{5}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{10}{66} \)
Option D : \( P(S S)+P(S J)=\frac{c_{2}^{5}}{c_{2}^{12}}+\frac{c_{1}^{5} \cdot c_{1}^{4}}{c_{2}^{12}}=\frac{10}{66}+ \) \( \frac{20}{66}=\frac{30}{66} \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\text { Option E:P(JS) }+P(J B)=\frac{c_{1}^{4} \cdot c_{1}^{5}}{c_{2}^{12}}+\frac{c_{1}^{4} \cdot c_{1}^{3}}{c_{2}^{12}}=\frac{20}{66}+ \\
\frac{12}{66}=\frac{32}{66}
\end{array}
\]

Based on the above computations, the most likely scenario is one person from Jakarta and one person from Surabaya or Bandung.
raw_answer:
Gunakan konsep peluang untuk mencari kemungkinan yang terjadi.

Opsi \( \mathbf{A}: P(B B)=\frac{C_{2}^{3}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{3}{66} \)
Opsi B : \( P(J J)=\frac{C_{2}^{4}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{6}{66} \)
Opsi C : \( P(S S)=\frac{C_{2}^{5}}{C_{2}^{12}}=\frac{10}{66} \)
Opsi D : \( P(S S)+P(S J)=\frac{c_{2}^{5}}{c_{2}^{12}}+\frac{c_{1}^{5} \cdot c_{1}^{4}}{c_{2}^{12}}=\frac{10}{66}+ \) \( \frac{20}{66}=\frac{30}{66} \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\text { Opsi E:P(JS) }+P(J B)=\frac{c_{1}^{4} \cdot c_{1}^{5}}{c_{2}^{12}}+\frac{c_{1}^{4} \cdot c_{1}^{3}}{c_{2}^{12}}=\frac{20}{66}+ \\
\frac{12}{66}=\frac{32}{66}
\end{array}
\]

Berdasarkan perhitungan di atas, maka kondisi yang paling mungkin adalah satu orang dari Jakarta dan satu orang dari Surabaya atau Bandung.

content:
A akan melakukan perjalanan ke Kota \( X \) dengan mempertimbangkan beberapa kondisi berikut. Jika kondisi lalu lintas lancar, waktu tempuh lebih singkat \( 12,5 \% \). Jika memilih rute alternatif yang salah, waktu tempuh bertambah \( \frac{1}{8} \) kali. Jika kondisi fisiknya kurang bugar, waktu tempuh
bertambah \( 10 \% \). Jika kondisi kendaraan yang prima, waktu tempuh lebih singkat \( \frac{1}{10} \) kali.

Manakah di antara pilihan berikut yang memberikan kemungkinan A menempuh waktu PALING SINGKAT?
answer:
From the multiple choice, it's clear that the shortest possible time is when the traffic conditions are smooth and the vehicle conditions are excellent (option B). However, let's delve into this issue. Assume the initial travel time \(=x\)
A. Traffic conditions (smooth) and alternative route (not wrong)
\[
(100 \%-12.5 \%) x=\left(1-\frac{1}{8}\right) x=\frac{7}{8} x
\]
B. Traffic conditions (smooth) and vehicle conditions (excellent)
\[
(100 \%-12.5 \%) \left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{7}{8}\left(\frac{9}{10}\right) x
\]
C. Alternative route (not wrong) and physical condition (fit)
\( x \)
D. Alternative route (not wrong) and vehicle conditions (excellent)
\[
\left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{9}{10} x
\]
E. Physical condition (fit) and vehicle conditions (excellent)
\[
\left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{9}{10} x
\]

Condition B is the shortest because the travel time becomes \( \frac{63}{80} \) times shorter.
raw_answer:
Dari pilihan ganda jelas bahwa waktu yang mungkin paling singkat adalah ketika Kondisi lalu lintas lancar dan kondisi kendaraan prima (pilihan B). Namun coba kita uraikan permasalahan ini. Misal waktu tempuh awal \( =x \)
A. Kondisi lalu lintas (lancar) dan rute alternatif (tidak salah)
\[
(100 \%-12,5 \%) x=\left(1-\frac{1}{8}\right) x=\frac{7}{8} x
\]
B. Kondisi lalu lintas (lancar) dan kondisi kendaraan (prima)
\[
(100 \%-12,5 \%)\left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{7}{8}\left(\frac{9}{10}\right) x
\]
C. Rute alternatif (tidak salah) dan kondisi fisik (bugar)
\( x \)
D. Rute alternatif (tidak salah) dan kondisi kendaraan (prima)
\[
\left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{9}{10} x
\]
E. Kondisi fisik (bugar) dan kondisi kendaraan (prima)
\[
\left(1-\frac{1}{10}\right) x=\frac{9}{10} x
\]

Kondisi B kondisi paling singkat karena waktu tempuh menjadi \( \frac{63}{80} \) kali lebih singkat.

content: Batu bata yang berhasil dicetak pabrik \( P \) adalah 450 buah. Jika jumlah tersebut lebih rendah \( 10 \% \) daripada target yang ditetapkan oleh pemilik pabrik, berapa batu bata yang harus dicapai?
answer:
Assume \( x \) is the target number of bricks.
\[
\begin{array}{c}
(100 \% - 10 \%) x = 450 \\
90 \% x = 450 \\
x = \frac{450}{0.9} = 500
\end{array}
\]
raw_answer:
Misalkan \( x \) adalah jumlah batu bata yang harus dicapai.
\[
\begin{array}{c}
(100 \%-10 \%) x=450 \\
90 \% x=450 \\
x=\frac{450}{0,9}=500
\end{array}
\]

content: Agus akan membuat 10 liter minuman kopi susu. Berapa liter susu yang dibutuhkan jika perbandingan kopi, susu, dan gula aren untuk membuat minuman tersebut adalah \( 12: 8: 5 \) ?
answer:
Agus is preparing a 10-liter milk coffee beverage. The ratio of coffee to milk to sugar is \(12:8:5\). The amount of milk Agus needs is calculated as follows:
\[
=\frac{8}{12+8+5} \times 10=\frac{8}{25} \times 10=3.2
\]

Kopi : susu : gula \( =12: 8: 5 \).
Susu yang dibutuhkan Agus
\[
=\frac{8}{12+8+5} \times 10=\frac{8}{25} \times 10=3,2
\]

content: Rata-rata kecepatan dari tiga pesepeda A, B dan C adalah \( 70 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{jam} \). Rata -rata kecepatan dari pesepeda A dan B adalah \( 75 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{jam} \). Jika kecepatan pesepeda B kurang dari \( 70 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{jam} \), manakah pernyataan yang PALING TEPAT menggambarkan kecepatan dari ketiga pesepeda tersebut?
answer:
The speeds of bicycle A, bicycle B, and bicycle C are respectively represented by \( a, b \), and \( c \).

Given:
(i) The average speed of all bicycles \( =70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}} \)
\[
\frac{a+b+c}{3}=70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}} \rightarrow a+b+c=210
\]
(ii) The average speed of bicycle A and B \( =75 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}} \)
\[
\frac{a+b}{2}=75 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}} \rightarrow a+b=150
\]
(iii) \( b<70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}} \)

Substitute equation (ii) into (i)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
a+b+c=210 \\
150+c=210 \rightarrow c=60 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}}
\end{array}
\]

Substitute (ii) into (iii)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
b<70 \\
150-a<70 \\
-a<-80 \\
a>80 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{hr}}
\end{array}
\]

From the above description, it can be concluded that bicycle A has the highest speed.
raw_answer:
Misal kecepatan sepeda A, sepeda B, dan sepeda \( C \) berturut-turut adalah \( a, b \), dan \( c \).

Diketahui:
(i) Rata-rata kecepatan semua sepeda \( =70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{jam}} \)
\[
\frac{a+b+c}{3}=70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{j a m} \rightarrow a+b+c=210
\]
(ii) Rata-rata kecepatan sepeda A dan B \( =75 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{jam}} \)
\[
\frac{a+b}{2}=75 \frac{k m}{j a m} \rightarrow a+b=150
\]
(iii) \( b<70 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{jam}} \)

Substitusi persamaan (ii) ke (i)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
a+b+c=210 \\
150+c=210 \rightarrow c=60 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\mathrm{jam}}
\end{array}
\]

Substitusi (ii) ke (iii)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
b<70 \\
150-a<70 \\
-a<-80 \\
a>80 \frac{\mathrm{km}}{\text { jam }}
\end{array}
\]

Dari uraian di atas didapatkan kecepatan sepeda A yang paling cepat

content:
Text 1
Social media advertising is a type of digital marketing that utilizes social networks such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram to deliver paid advertisements to your target audience in a quick and effective way to connect with customers and boost your marketing campaigns.

By leveraging various data sources, advertisers are able to hyper target their audiences and deliver personalized content based on demographics and user behavior. When an audience social media advertisers may see more interaction and conversion. Social media advertisements are also cost effective, offering the potential for high rates of return.

Social media advertising is a must if you want to quickly reach new target markets. More and more companies - including the world 's top performing brands- utilize social media companies and reach out to new consumers. To keep up with the competition, we need to learn how these ads work and how they can benefit your company.

Because both the Internet and content marketing are constantly evolving, there are many ways to go about your advertising strategy on social media platforms. The types advertising your preferred platforms and the audience you want to reach.

When considering social media advertising options, such as which advertising platform to use, remember that each platform has its own audience. That means you want to choose customers. If you are already active on social media, pay attention to which platforms perform well and which organic posts get the most interaction to target the best audience.
Text 2
How effective are advertisements on social media advertisements are just one of the innumerable ways to reach consumers today, alongside TV print, podcast, out-of-home advertising, and a long list of other digital channels and guerilla tactics. In the world of advertising, media is more fragmented than it has ever been. When it comes to how effective social media advertising is, the data offers brands some good news "Promisingly \( 26 \% \) of social media users say they tend to buy brands they see advertised."
Clearly, adverts are not the only way for customers to discover brands. However, if you built your strategy around social media advertising, it is crucial to get it right. \( 90 \% \) of consumers globally say they have visited a social network in the past month. Meanwhile, global social media advertising spending is projected to grow \( 15 \% \) annually through 2024 . Nevertheless, with so many social media advertisements spending is projected to grow \( 15 \% \) annually through 2024. Nevertheless, with so many social media advertisements saturating our feeds standing out is key.

So, how exactly can you optimize your brand's social media presence to inspire and engage your audience? Using the latest social media report, we sent out to explore exactly these issues. It starts with a lock on the audience. Around the world, \( 27 \% \) of social media users say they use social media platforms primarily to research and find products to buy, Gen Z and millennials make up \( 68 \% \) of these using social media for product discovery. That is surprising, given they are among the heaviest users of social media globally. Unlike their older counterparts, who use social media more moderately, millennials spend over 2.5 hours per day on social media, and Gen Z spend just under 3 hours per day on various platforms. Hence, there are three key things to keep in mind to increase effectiveness and get more bang for your advertising buck. Those are knowing the audience, making social media frictionless, and lastly using social media to inform.

content:
Sebuah perusahaan menggunakan mesin cetak \( A \) dan B untuk mencetak dokumen. Berikut ini adalah informasi mengenai proses pencetakan dokumen tersebut: i. Dengan hanya menggunakan mesin cetak B, keseluruhan dokumen dapat selesai dalam waktu 30 jam.
ii. Mesin A dapat mencetak 15.000 dokumen setiap jam.
iii. Mesin A dapat mencetak lebih cepat daripada mesin B.
iv. Dengan menggunakan kedua mesin, keseluruhan dokumen dapat diselesaikan dalam waktu 12 jam.

Informasi manakah yang dapat digunakan untuk menentukan waktu yang dibutuhkan oleh mesin A untuk mencetak seluruh dokumen?
answer:
To find out the time required by machine A to print all documents, we need information (i) and (iv) as follows:
\( a= \) time for machine A to print all documents
\( b= \) time for machine B to print all documents

Given
\( b=30 \) hours ...(i)
\( \frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=\frac{1}{12} \) hours ...(iv)
Substituting (i) into (iv) we get \( \begin{array}{l}\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{30}=\frac{1}{12} \\ \frac{1}{a}=\frac{1}{12}-\frac{1}{30}=\frac{1}{20} \\ a=20 \text { hours }\end{array} \)
raw_answer:
Untuk menentukan waktu yang dibutuhkan oleh mesin A untuk mencetak seluruh dokumen kita butuh informasi (i) dan (iv) dengan cara sebagai berikut:
\( a= \) waktu mesin A mencetak seluruh dokumen
\( b= \) waktu mesin B mencetak seluruh dokumen

Diketahui
\( b=30 \) jam ...(i)
\( \frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=\frac{1}{12} \) jam ...(iv)
substitusi (i) ke (iv) kita dapatkan \( \begin{array}{l}\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{30}=\frac{1}{12} \\ \frac{1}{a}=\frac{1}{12}-\frac{1}{30}=\frac{1}{20} \\ a=20 \text { jam }\end{array} \)

content: Jika \( f(x)=\frac{2 x+1}{x^{2}-3} \), maka turunan pertama dari fungsi \( f \) di -3 adalah \( f^{\prime}(-3)=\cdots \)
Volume balok terbesar yang luas semua bidang sisinya \( 96 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \) dan alasnya persegi adalah ....
answer:
Given:
Length \( =x \)
Width \( =x \)
Height \( =y \)
Surface area \( =96 \)
\[
2 x^{2}+4 x y=96 \Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x y=48
\]
\[
x y=\frac{48-x^{2}}{2}
\]

Volume of the rectangular prism
\[
V=x \cdot x \cdot y=x(x y)=\frac{x\left(48-x^{2}\right)}{2}=\frac{48 x-x^{3}}{2}
\]

Condition for maximum volume is \( V^{\prime}=0 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
V^{\prime}=24-\frac{3}{2} x^{2}=0 \\
16-x^{2}=0 \\
x=4 \\
y=4 \\
V=x^{2} y=4^{2} \cdot 4=64
\end{array}
\] 

Paraphrased:
Given:
Assume:
Length \( =x \)
Width \( =x \)
Height \( =y \)
Area of all sides \( =96 \)
\[
2 x^{2}+4 x y=96 \Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x y=48
\]
\[
x y=\frac{48-x^{2}}{2}
\]

Volume of the rectangular prism
\[
V=x \cdot x \cdot y=x(x y)=\frac{x\left(48-x^{2}\right)}{2}=\frac{48 x-x^{3}}{2}
\]

Condition for maximum volume is \( V^{\prime}=0 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
V^{\prime}=24-\frac{3}{2} x^{2}=0 \\
16-x^{2}=0 \\
x=4 \\
y=4 \\
V=x^{2} y=4^{2} \cdot 4=64
\end{array}
\] 

Answer: \( V=64 \)
raw_answer:
misalkan :
panjang \( =x \)
lebar \( =x \)
tinggi \( =y \)
luas semua sisi \( =96 \)
\[
2 x^{2}+4 x y=96 \Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x y=48
\]
\[
x y=\frac{48-x^{2}}{2}
\]

Volume balok
\[
V=x \cdot x \cdot y=x(x y)=\frac{x\left(48-x^{2}\right)}{2}=\frac{48 x-x^{3}}{2}
\]

Syarat Volume balok terbesar adalah \( V^{\prime}=0 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
V^{\prime}=24-\frac{3}{2} x^{2}=0 \\
16-x^{2}=0 \\
x=4 \\
y=4 \\
V=x^{2} y=4^{2} \cdot 4=64
\end{array}
\]

content: Nilai minimum dari fungsi \( y=(x-3) \sqrt{x} \) adalah....
answer: \( \begin{array}{l}\begin{array}{l}y=(x-3) \sqrt{x}=x^{\frac{3}{2}}-3 x^{\frac{1}{2}} \\ \text { To find the minimum value of } y, \text{ we set } y^{\prime}=0 \\ \qquad y^{\prime}=\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{1}{2}}-\frac{3}{2 x^{\frac{1}{2}}}=0 \\ x=1\end{array} \\ \text { Therefore, the minimum value of } y=(1-3) \sqrt{1}=-2\end{array} \)
raw_answer: \( \begin{array}{l}\begin{array}{l}y=(x-3) \sqrt{x}=x^{\frac{3}{2}}-3 x^{\frac{1}{2}} \\ \text { Syarat nilai minimum } y^{\prime}=0 \\ \qquad y^{\prime}=\frac{3}{2} x^{\frac{1}{2}}-\frac{3}{2 x^{\frac{1}{2}}}=0 \\ x=1\end{array} \\ \text { Jadi nilai minimumnya } y=(1-3) \sqrt{1}=-2\end{array} \)

content: Turunan pertama dari fungsi \( y=\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\cos x+\sin x} \) adalah...
answer: \( \begin{aligned} & y=\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\cos x+\sin x} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{(-\sin x-\cos x)(\cos x+\sin x)-(-\sin x+\cos x)(\cos x-\sin x)}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{-(1+2 \sin x \cos x)-(1-2 \sin x \cos x)}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{-2}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}}\end{aligned} \)
raw_answer: \( \begin{aligned} & y=\frac{\cos x-\sin x}{\cos x+\sin x} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{(-\sin x-\cos x)(\cos x+\sin x)-(-\sin x+\cos x)(\cos x-\sin x)}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{-(1+2 \sin x \cos x)-(1-2 \sin x \cos x)}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}} \\ y^{\prime}= & \frac{-2}{(\cos x+\sin x)^{2}}\end{aligned} \)

content: Terdapat 2 kotak yang masing-masing berisi bola hitam dan bola putih, dan banyaknya bola pada kedua kotak adalah 20. Sebuah bola diambil dari masing-masing kotak dan peluang bahwa kedua bola berwarna hitam adalah \( \frac{5}{12} \), dan peluang bahwa kedua bola berwarna putih adalah \( \frac{m}{n} \) dengan \( m \) dan \( n \) adalah bilangan bulat positif terkecil yang mungkin. Nilai \( m+n \) adalah ...
answer:
Given:
There are 2 boxes, each containing black and white balls.

The total number of balls in both boxes is 20.
If a ball is taken from each box,
- The probability that both balls are black is \( \frac{5}{12} \)
- The probability that both balls are white is \( \frac{m}{n} \)
- \( m \) and \( n \) are the smallest integers.

To find:
\[
m+n=\cdots .
\]

Let the number of balls in box I be \( x \), so the number of balls in box II is \( 20-x \).

Let the number of black balls in box I be \( H_{1} \) and the number of black balls in box II be \( \mathrm{H}_{2} \), so the probability that both balls are black is \( \frac{5}{12} \).
\[
\begin{aligned}
P_{1}(B) \cdot P_{2}(B) & =\frac{5}{12} \\
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{5}{12} \\
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{15}{36}
\end{aligned}
\]

Next, let's look at the denominators,
\[
\begin{aligned}
x \cdot(20-x) & =36 \\
20 x-x^{2} & =36 \\
x^{2}-20 x+36 & =0 \\
(x-2)(x-18) & =0 \\
x=2 & \text { or } x=18
\end{aligned}
\]

Let's choose one value for \( x \), let's say \( x=2 \).
So the number of balls in box I is 2, which means the number of black balls in box 1 is 1 and the number of white balls in box 1 is 1.

Since \( H_{1}=1 \), we can determine \( H_{2} \) next.
\[
\begin{aligned}
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{15}{36} \\
\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{18} & =\frac{15}{36} \\
H_{2} & =15
\end{aligned}
\]

Since the number of balls in box II is 18, the number of white balls is 3.

The probability that both balls are white is \( \frac{m}{n} \).
\[
\begin{aligned}
P_{1}(W) \cdot P_{2}(W) & =\frac{m}{n} \\
\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{3}{18} & =\frac{m}{n} \\
\frac{1}{12} & =\frac{m}{n}
\end{aligned}
\]

Therefore, \( m=1 \) and \( n=12 \), so \( m+n=1+12=13 \)
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
Terdapat 2 kotak, masing-masing berisi bola hitam dan putih.

Jumlah bola kedua kotak adalah 20
Jika di ambil sebuah bola dari masing-masing kotak
- Peluang kedua bola berwarna hitam adalah \( \frac{5}{12} \)
- Peluang kedua bola berwarna putih adalah \( \frac{m}{n} \)
- \( m \) dan \( n \) bilangan bulat terkecil.

Ditanyakan :
\[
m+n=\cdots .
\]

Misalkan jumlah bola dikotak I adalah \( x \), maka jumlah bola dikotak II adalah \( 20-x \)

Misalkan jumlah bolah hitam di kotak I adalah \( H_{1} \) Dan jumlah bola hitam dikotak 2 adalah \( \mathrm{H}_{2} \), sehingga Peluang kedua bola berwarna hitam adalah \( \frac{5}{12} \)
\[
\begin{aligned}
P_{1}(H) \cdot P_{2}(H) & =\frac{5}{12} \\
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{5}{12} \\
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{15}{36}
\end{aligned}
\]

Selanjutnya kita cukup lihat penyebutnya,
\[
\begin{aligned}
x \cdot(20-x) & =36 \\
20 x-x^{2} & =36 \\
x^{2}-20 x+36 & =0 \\
(x-2)(x-18) & =0 \\
x=2 & \text { atau } x=18
\end{aligned}
\]

Kita pilih salah satu nilai \( x \) nya, misal \( x=2 \)
Jadi jumlah bola dikotak I adalah 2, sehingga kemungkinannya jumlah bola hitam dikotak \( 1 H_{1}= \) 1 dan jumlah bola putih dikotak 1 adalah 1 .

Karena \( H_{1}=1 \), selanjutnya menentukan \( H_{2} \)
\[
\begin{aligned}
\frac{H_{1}}{x} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{20-x} & =\frac{15}{36} \\
\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{H_{2}}{18} & =\frac{15}{36} \\
H_{2} & =15
\end{aligned}
\]

Karena jumlah bola dikotak II adalah 18, maka jumlah bola putih adalah 3

Peluang kedua bola berwarna putih adalah \( \frac{m}{n} \)
\[
\begin{aligned}
P_{1}(P) \cdot P_{2}(P) & =\frac{m}{n} \\
\frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{3}{18} & =\frac{m}{n} \\
\frac{1}{12} & =\frac{m}{n}
\end{aligned}
\]

Dengan demikian \( m=1 \) dan \( n=12 \), jadi \( m+ \) \( n=1+12=13 \)

content:
Seorang petani membeli pupuk jenis \( \mathrm{X} \) dan \( \mathrm{Y} \) dengan berat dan harga yang berbeda. Berikut ini adalah informasi mengenai harga dan berat pupuk yang dibeli.
i. Pupuk \( X \) dan \( Y \) dijual dengan harga yang sama.
ii. Untuk harga yang sama, petani membeli pupuk jenis \( X \) dua kali lebih banyak daripada pupuk jenis \( Y \).
iii. Petani menghabiskan uang Rp600.000,00 untuk membeli pupuk jenis \( X \) dengan harga per kilogram Rp20.000,00.
iv. Biaya yang digunakan untuk membeli pupuk jenis \( Y \) lebih murah daripada pupuk jenis \( X \).

Informasi manakah yang dapat digunakan untuk menentukan biaya yang harus dikeluarkan oleh petani untuk membeli pupuk?
answer: To calculate the cost that farmers need to spend to purchase fertilizer, we need information (ii) and (iii). From statement (iii) we find that the total purchase of fertilizer \( X \) is Rp600,000 with a total weight of \( 30 \mathrm{~kg} \). If we look at statement (ii) it mentions for the same price, farmers buy twice as much fertilizer \( X \) than fertilizer Y. This means farmers spend as much as Rp600,000 \( \times 2= \) Rp1,200,000 with a total of \( 30 \mathrm{~kg} \) for fertilizer \( X \) and \( 15 \mathrm{~kg} \) for fertilizer \( Y \).
raw_answer: Untuk menentukan biaya yang harus dikeluarkan oleh petani untuk membeli pupuk kita membutuhkan informasi (ii) dan (iii). Dari pernyataan (iii) kita dapatkan bahwa total pembelian pupuk \( X \) yaitu Rp600.000 dengan berat total \( 30 \mathrm{~kg} \). Jika kita perhatikan pernyataan (ii) menyebutkan untuk harga yang sama, petani membeli pupuk jenis \( X \) dua kali lebih banyak daripada pupuk jenis Y. Artinya petani mengeluarkan uang sebanyak Rp600.000 \( \times 2= \) Rp1.200.000 dengan total \( 30 \mathrm{~kg} \) untuk pupuk \( X \) dan \( 15 \mathrm{~kg} \) pupuk \( Y \).

\begin{align*}
a &=\frac{1}{150} \times 1312=\frac{1}{75} \times 656, \\
b &=\frac{20 \frac{1}{4}}{100} \times 131 \frac{2}{10}=\frac{B 1}{400} \times \frac{1312}{10}=\frac{B 1}{2000} \times 656.
\end{align*}
\]

Since \( \frac{1}{75}<\frac{\mathrm{B1}}{300} \), it follows that \( a<b \).
raw_answer:
\[
\begin{array}{l}
a=\frac{1}{150} \times 1312=\frac{1}{75} \times 656 \\
b=\frac{20 \frac{1}{4}}{100} \times 131 \frac{2}{10}=\frac{B 1}{400} \times \frac{1312}{10}=\frac{B 1}{2000} \times 656
\end{array}
\]

Karena \( \frac{1}{75}<\frac{\mathrm{B1}}{300} \) maka \( a<b \)

content: Suatu persegi \( P \) mempunyai sisi \( x \). Jika persegi panjang \( Q \) mempunyai panjang \( y \) dua kali lebar sisi persegi \( P \), maka ....
answer:
If square \( P \) has a side \( x \), then the length \( = \) width \( = \) \( x \).

Rectangle \( Q \) has a length \( y \) that is twice the width of square \( P \)'s side, so \( y = 2x \).
raw_answer:
Persegi \( P \) mempunyai sisi \( x \), maka panjang \( = \) lebar \( = \) \( x \)

Persegi panjang \( Q \) mempunyai panjang \( y \) dua kali lebar sisi persegi \( P \), maka \( y=2 x \).

content: Sepuluh anak membentuk kelompok bermain yang masing-masing terdiri dari 4 anak adalah 6 tahun, dan kelompok 6 anak adalah 6,5 tahun. Jika satu dari masing-masing kelompok dipertukarkan, maka ratarata usia kedua kelompok sama. Berapa tahunkah selisih usia kedua anak yang dipertukarkan....
answer:
It's known that 
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\bar{x}_{A}=6 \text { years and } n_{A}=4 \\
\bar{x}_{B}=6.5 \text { years and } n_{B}=6 \\
n_{T}=10
\end{array}
\]

Therefore, the age difference of the two swapped children is
\[
\begin{array}{l}
x_{2}-x_{1}=\frac{\bar{x}_{B} n_{B} n_{A}-\bar{x}_{A} n_{A} n_{B}}{n_{T}} \\
=\frac{(6.5)(6)(4)-(6)(4)(6)}{10} \\
=\frac{156-144}{10}=\frac{12}{10}=1.2
\end{array}
\]
raw_answer:
Diketahui
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\bar{x}_{A}=6 \text { Tahun dan } n_{A}=4 \\
\bar{x}_{B}=6,5 \text { Tahun dan } n_{B}=6 \\
n_{T}=10
\end{array}
\]

Jadi selisih usia kedua anak yang dipertukarkan adalah
\[
\begin{array}{l}
x_{2}-x_{1}=\frac{\bar{x}_{B} n_{B} n_{A}-\bar{x}_{A} n_{A} n_{B}}{n_{T}} \\
=\frac{(6,5)(6)(4)-(6)(4)(6)}{10} \\
=\frac{156-144}{10}=\frac{12}{10}=1,2
\end{array}
\]

content: Bilangan berikut yg nilainya terbesar adalah ....
answer:
The largest number is the one with the most digits.
(here I'm doing a rough calculation)
*) 777 only has 7 digits.
*) \( 7^{77}=(10-3)^{77} \approx 10^{77} \) has about 77 digits.
*) \( \left(7^{7}\right)^{7}=7^{49}=(10-3)^{49} \approx 10^{49} \) has about 49 digits
*) \( 77^{7}=(100-23)^{7} \approx 100^{7} \) has about 14 digits
8) \( (7 \times 7)^{7}=49^{7}=7^{14}=(10-3)^{14} \approx 10^{14} \) has about 14 digits.
raw_answer:
Bilangan terbesar adalah bilangan yang memiliki digit paling banyak.
(disini saya melakukan perhitungan kasar)
*) 777 hanya memiliki 7 digit.
*) \( 7^{77}=(10-3)^{77} \approx 10^{77} \) ada sekitar 77 digit.
*) \( \left(7^{7}\right)^{7}=7^{49}=(10-3)^{49} \approx 10^{49} \) ada sekitar 49 digit
*) \( 77^{7}=(100-23)^{7} \approx 100^{7} \) ada sekitar 14 digit
8) \( (7 \times 7)^{7}=49^{7}=7^{14}=(10-3)^{14} \approx 10^{14} \) ada sekitar 14 digit.

content: Jika perbandingan volume dua buah kubus adalah 1 : 8. Perbandingan luas permukaan dua kubus tersebut adalah ....
answer:
It is known that
\[
\frac{V_{1}}{V_{2}}=\frac{1}{8}
\]

What is the ratio of the surface area of the cube = \( \frac{L_{1}}{L_{2}}=\frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}} \) ?
\[
\frac{V_{1}}{V_{2}}=\frac{1}{8} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}^{3}}{s_{2}^{3}}=\frac{1}{8} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}}{s_{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}
\]

So \( \frac{L_{1}}{L_{2}}=\frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}}=\frac{1}{4} \)
raw_answer:
Diketahui
\[
\frac{V_{1}}{V_{2}}=\frac{1}{8}
\]

Di tanyakan perbandingan luas permukaan kubus = \( \frac{L_{1}}{L_{2}}=\frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}} \) ?
\[
\frac{V_{1}}{V_{2}}=\frac{1}{8} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}^{3}}{s_{2}^{3}}=\frac{1}{8} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}}{s_{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \leftrightarrow \frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}
\]

Jadi \( \frac{L_{1}}{L_{2}}=\frac{s_{1}^{2}}{s_{2}^{2}}=\frac{1}{4} \)

content: Jika \( 0<x<2 y<2 \) dan \( z=x+y \) maka nilai \( z \) berada antara nilai ....
answer:
From the above interval, if the minimum value of \(x=0\), then the minimum value of \(y=0\), resulting in the minimum value of \(z=x+y=0+0=0\).

If the maximum value of \(x=2\), then the maximum value of \(y\) is \(x=2y \leftrightarrow y=\frac{1}{2}x=\frac{1}{2}(2)=1\), thus the maximum value of \(z=x+y=1+2=3\) is obtained. Therefore, the value of \(z\) lies between 0 and 3.
raw_answer:
\[
0<x<2 y<2
\]

Dari interval di atas jika nilai minimum \( x=0 \), maka diperoleh minimum \( y=0 \), sehingga nilai minimum \( z=x+y=0+0=0 \).

Jika nilai maksimum \( x=2 \), maka nilai maksimum \( y \) adalah \( x=2 y \leftrightarrow y=\frac{1}{2} x=\frac{1}{2}(2)=1 \), sehingga diperoleh nilai maksimum \( z=x+y=1+2=3 \). Jadi nilai \( z \) berada di antara 0 dan 3 .

content: Umur Ulfa \( \frac{1}{3} \) kali umur ayahnya, Umur Ibunya \( \frac{5}{6} \) kali umur Ayahnya. Jika umur Ulfa 18 tahun, maka umur ibunya adalah .....
Luas suatu persegi A adalah \( 25 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \). Jika keliling persegi \( B \) adalah 4 kali keliling persegi \( A \), luas persegi B adalah ....
answer:
Provided:
Square area: \( L_{A}=25 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \), therefore the side of square A:
\[
S_{A}=\sqrt{25}=5 \mathrm{~cm} \text {. }
\]

The perimeter of square \( B \) is 4 times the perimeter of square \( A \), so \( K_{B}=4 K_{A} \leftrightarrow 4 S_{B}=4\left(4 S_{A}\right) \)
\[
S_{B}=4 S_{A}=4(5)=20 \mathrm{~cm}
\]
thus the area of square B is \( L_{B}=S_{B}^{2}=20^{2}= \) \( 400 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \)
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
Luas persegi : \( L_{A}=25 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \), maka sisi persegi A :
\[
S_{A}=\sqrt{25}=5 \mathrm{~cm} \text {. }
\]

Keliling persegi \( B \) adalah 4 kali keliling persegi \( A \), maka \( K_{B}=4 K_{A} \leftrightarrow 4 S_{B}=4\left(4 S_{A}\right) \)
\[
S_{B}=4 S_{A}=4(5)=20 \mathrm{~cm}
\]
jadi Luas persegi B adalah \( L_{B}=S_{B}^{2}=20^{2}= \) \( 400 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \)

content: Jika pembilang pada suatu pecahan ditambah 3 maka nilainya adalah \( \frac{1}{3} \), dan jika penyebutnya dikurangi 3 , maka nilainya adalah \( \frac{1}{6} \). Pecahan yang dimaksud adalah ......
answer:
Assume the fraction is \( \frac{a}{b} \)
If the numerator of the fraction is increased by 3, the value is \( \frac{1}{3} \), so we can write \( \frac{a+3}{b}=\frac{1}{3} \)
\( 3 a+9=b \)....equation 1
If the denominator is decreased by 3 , the value is \( \frac{1}{6} \), so we can write \( \frac{a}{b-3}=\frac{1}{6} \) \( 6 a=b-3 \quad \ldots \) equation 2

Substitute equation 1 into equation 2 .
\( 6 a=(3 a+9)-3 \)
\( 3 a=6 \rightarrow a=2 \)
And \( b=15 \)
So the fraction in question is
\[
\frac{a}{b}=\frac{2}{15}
\]

Answer B
raw_answer:
Misalkan pecahannya adalah \( \frac{a}{b} \)
Pembilang suatu pecahannya di tambah 3 maka nilainya adalah \( \frac{1}{3} \), maka dapat kita tulis \( \frac{a+3}{b}=\frac{1}{3} \)
\( 3 a+9=b \)....pers 1
Penyebutnya dikurangi 3 , maka nilainya adalah \( \frac{1}{6} \), maka dapat kita tulis \( \frac{a}{b-3}=\frac{1}{6} \) \( 6 a=b-3 \quad \ldots \) pers 2

Substitusi persamaan 1 ke persamaan 2 .
\( 6 a=(3 a+9)-3 \)
\( 3 a=6 \rightarrow a=2 \)
Dan \( b=15 \)
Jadi pecahan yang dimaksud adalah
\[
\frac{a}{b}=\frac{2}{15}
\]

Jawaban B

content: Jika \( x \) dan \( y \) bilangan bulat genap, dengan \( 23<x< \) 26 dan \( 24<y<27 \) maka
answer:
Since \( x \) is an even integer and \( 23<x<26 \), the set \( x=\{24\} \)
since \( y \) is an even integer and \( 24<y<27 \), the set \( y=\{26\} \)
thus we can conclude \( x<y \)
raw_answer:
Karena \( x \) bilangan bulat genap dan \( 23<x<26 \), maka himpunan \( x=\{24\} \)
karena \( y \) bilangan bulat genap dan \( 24<y<27 \), maka himpunan \( y=\{26\} \)
maka dapat kita simpulkan \( x<y \)

content: Diketahui lebar persegi panjang seperlima dari panjangnya. Jika luasnya 180 satuan luas dan lebarnya \( P \) satuan panjang, maka nilai \( -15+\sqrt{3 P^{2}-27}=\cdots \)
answer:
Known:
Width value \( l=P \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
l=\frac{1}{5} p \quad \ldots . . \text { equation } 1 \\
L=180 \quad \leftrightarrow \quad p l=180 \quad \ldots . \text { equation } 2
\end{array}
\]

Substitute equation 1 into equation 2 we get
\[
p\left(\frac{1}{5} p\right)=180 \leftrightarrow p^{2}=900 \leftrightarrow p=30
\]

Hence, the width value \( l=\frac{1}{5} p=\frac{1}{5}(30)=6 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
P=6 \\
\begin{aligned}
-15+\sqrt{3 P^{2}-27} & =-15+\sqrt{3(6)^{2}-27} \\
& =-15+\sqrt{81}=-6
\end{aligned}
\end{array}
\]
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
Nilai lebar \( l=P \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
l=\frac{1}{5} p \quad \ldots . . \text { pers } 1 \\
L=180 \quad \leftrightarrow \quad p l=180 \quad \ldots . \text { pers } 2
\end{array}
\]

Substitusi pers 1 ke pers 2 diperoleh
\[
p\left(\frac{1}{5} p\right)=180 \leftrightarrow p^{2}=900 \leftrightarrow p=30
\]

Jadi nilai lebarnya \( l=\frac{1}{5} p=\frac{1}{5}(30)=6 \)
\[
\begin{array}{l}
P=6 \\
\begin{aligned}
-15+\sqrt{3 P^{2}-27} & =-15+\sqrt{3(6)^{2}-27} \\
& =-15+\sqrt{81}=-6
\end{aligned}
\end{array}
\]

content: Di supermarket ibu berbelanja sayuran yang terdiri atas kangkung, kubis, sawi, brokoli, cabe, bayam, buncis, tomat, dan kentang dengan harga rata-rata Rp4.250 per kg. kemudian ia menambah membeli wortel. \begin{aligned}
\text { Price of Carrot }= & 10(4350)-9(4250) \\
= & 43500-38250 \\
& =5250
\end{aligned}
\]

Diketahui ibu membeli 9 sayuran dengan rata-rata harganya Rp4.250 per kg

Jika ditambah wortel (jadi 10 sayuran) rata-rata harganya menjadi 4.350 per \( \mathrm{kg} \).

Ditanyakan :
Harga wortel ?
\[
\begin{aligned}
\text { Harga Wortel }= & 10(4350)-9(4250) \\
= & 43500-38250 \\
& =5250
\end{aligned}
\]

content: Satu tim yang terdiri atas 12 orang dapat menyelesaikan sebuah pekerjaan dalam 12 hari. Bila 4 orang dari tim tersebut tidak dapat bekerja karena sakit, berapa persen penambahan hari untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan tersebut?
answer:
Reverse ratio case
Given:
12 people can complete a job in 12 days.
Question:
If 8 people can complete the job, how many days will it take?
12 people \( \rightarrow 12 \) days
8 people \( \rightarrow x \) days

So \( 8 \times x=12 \times 12 \)
\[
x=\frac{144}{8}=18 \text { days }
\]
So it increases by 6 days from the original schedule. Thus its percentage is
\[
\text { Percentage of days }=\frac{6}{12} \times 100 \%=50 \%
\]
raw_answer:
Kasus perbandingan terbalik
Diketahui :
12 orang dpt menyelesaikan pekerjaan dalam 12 hari.
Ditanyakan :
Bila 8 orang dpt menyelesaikan pekerjaan dlm berapa hari?
12 orang \( \rightarrow 12 \) hari
8 orang \( \rightarrow x \) hari

Jadi \( 8 \times x=12 \times 12 \)
\[
x=\frac{144}{8}=18 \text { hari }
\]
jadi bertambah 6 hari dari jadwal semula. Sehingga persentasinya adalah
\[
\text { Persentase hari }=\frac{6}{12} \times 100 \%=50 \%
\]

content: Diketahui \( x^{2} y^{5}-38=250 \) dan \( \frac{2}{x y}=\frac{1}{3} \) maka nilai \( \frac{2}{3} x-\frac{7}{2} y+11=\cdots \)
answer:
It is known that:
\[
x^{2} y^{5} - 38 = 250 \text { and } \frac{2}{x y} = \frac{1}{3}
\]

It is asked:
\[
\text {*) } \begin{array}{l}
\frac{2}{3} x - \frac{7}{2} y + 11 = \ldots \\
x^{2} y^{5} - 38 = 250 \\
(x y)^{2} y^{3} = 288 \ldots . \text { equation } 1
\end{array}
\]
*)
\[
\frac{2}{x y} = \frac{1}{3} \rightarrow x y = 6 \ldots \text { equation } 2
\]

Substitute equation 2 into equation 1 to get....
\[
\begin{array}{l}
(x y)^{2} y^{3} = 288 \\
(6)^{2} y^{3} = 288 \rightarrow y^{3} = \frac{288}{36} = 8 \rightarrow y = 2
\end{array}
\]

Substitute \( y = 2 \) into equation 2 to get
\[
x y = 6 \rightarrow x(2) = 6 \rightarrow x = 3
\]

Hence, the value of
\[
\frac{2}{3} x - \frac{7}{2} y + 11 = \frac{2}{3}(3) - \frac{7}{2}(2) + 11 = 6
\]
raw_answer:
Diketahui:
\[
x^{2} y^{5}-38=250 \text { dan } \frac{2}{x y}=\frac{1}{3}
\]

Ditanyakan :
\[
\text { *) } \begin{array}{l}
\frac{2}{3} x-\frac{7}{2} y+11=\ldots \\
x^{2} y^{5}-38=250 \\
(x y)^{2} y^{3}=288 \ldots . \text { pers } 1
\end{array}
\]
*)
\[
\frac{2}{x y}=\frac{1}{3} \rightarrow x y=6 \ldots \text { pers } 2
\]

Substitusi pers 2 ke pers 1 diperoleh....
\[
\begin{array}{l}
(x y)^{2} y^{3}=288 \\
(6)^{2} y^{3}=288 \rightarrow y^{3}=\frac{288}{36}=8 \rightarrow y=2
\end{array}
\]

Substitusi \( y=2 \) ke pers 2 , diperoleh
\[
x y=6 \rightarrow x(2)=6 \rightarrow x=3
\]

Jadi nilai
\[
\frac{2}{3} x-\frac{7}{2} y+11=\frac{2}{3}(3)-\frac{7}{2}(2)+11=6
\]

content: Kelas XIIA terdiri dari 10 murid laki-laki dan 20 murid perempuan. Setengah dari jumlah murid laki-laki dan setengah dari jumlah murid perempuan berambut keriting. Apabila seorang murid dipilih secara acak untuk mengerjakan soal, maka peluang bahwa murid yang tepilih itu lakilaki atau berambut keriting adalah ....
answer:
Terdapat 10 murid laki-laki 
Terdapat 20 murid perempuan 
5 dari murid laki-laki memiliki rambut keriting 
10 dari murid perempuan memiliki rambut keriting 
Total murid yang memiliki rambut keriting adalah 15 

\[
\begin{array}{l}
P(L \cup K)=P(L)+P(K)-P(L \cap K) \\
P(L \cup K)=\frac{10}{30}+\frac{15}{30}-\frac{5}{30}=\frac{20}{30} \\
\text { Metode alternatif } \\
P(L \cup K)=1-P(\text { perempuan berambut lurus }) \\
P(L \cup K)=1-\frac{10}{30}=\frac{20}{30}
\end{array}
\]

Metode alternatif
raw_answer:
Jumlah laki-laki \( =10 \) murid
Jumlah perempuan \( =20 \) murid
Jumlah yang laki berambut keriting \( =5 \) murid
Jumlah yang perempuan keriting \( =10 \) murid
Jumlah seluruhnya yang keriting \( =15 \) murid
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\quad P(L \cup K)=P(L)+P(K)-P(L \cap K) \\
P(L \cup K)=\frac{10}{30}+\frac{15}{30}-\frac{5}{30}=\frac{20}{30} \\
\text { Cara lain } \\
P(L \cup K)=1-P(\text { perempuan yg tdk keriting) } \\
P(L \cup K)=1-\frac{10}{30}=\frac{20}{30}
\end{array}
\]

Cara lain

        \( \begin{array}{l}\text { Case of direct proportion } \\ \begin{array}{l}\text { Distance } 6 \mathrm{~km} \rightarrow \\ \text { distance } 22,5 \rightarrow x \text { minutes }\end{array} \\ \text { So } \quad x \text { minutes } \\ \qquad \begin{array}{l}x \\ \overline{8}=\frac{22,5}{6} \\ x=\frac{22,5}{6} \times 8=30 \text { minutes }\end{array}\end{array} \)
raw_answer: \( \begin{array}{l}\text { Kasus perbandingan lurus } \\ \begin{array}{l}\text { Jarak } 6 \mathrm{~km} \rightarrow \\ \text { jarak } 22,5 \rightarrow x \text { menit }\end{array} \\ \text { Jadi } \quad x \text { menit } \\ \qquad \begin{array}{l}x \\ \overline{8}=\frac{22,5}{6} \\ x=\frac{22,5}{6} \times 8=30 \text { menit }\end{array}\end{array} \)

content:
Suatu kelas terdiri atas 10 pelajar pria dan 20 pelajar wanita. Separuh pelajar pria memakai arloji dan separuh pelajar wanita juga memakai
arloji. Jika dipilih satu pelajar, maka peluang yang terpilih wanita atau memakai arloji adalah
answer: Kemungkinan seorang pria tidak menggunakan jam tangan adalah \( \frac{5}{30} \). Oleh karena itu, kemungkinan seorang wanita dipilih atau menggunakan jam tangan adalah \( 1-\frac{5}{30}=\frac{25}{30}=\frac{5}{6} \)
raw_answer: Peluang laki-laki tidak memakai arloji adalah \( \frac{5}{30} \) Jadi peluang terpilih wanita atau memakaiarloji adalah \( 1-\frac{5}{30}=\frac{25}{30}=\frac{5}{6} \)

content: Jika \( 2^{a+2}=64 \) dan \( 3^{b+2}=27 \), berapakah nilai \( a+ \) \( b \) ?
answer:
Please provide me with the Mathpix latex version of the given latex if any. 
If the original text is in Indonesian, please convert it to Indonesian, and if it's in English, please convert it to English. 
I just need the answer, not any other text.
(*) \( 2^{a+2}=64 \leftrightarrow 2^{a+2}=2^{6} \rightarrow a+2=6 \) Hence \( a=4 \)
(*) \( 3^{b+2}=27 \leftrightarrow 3^{b+2}=3^{3} \rightarrow b+2=3 \) Hence \( b=1 \)
The value of \( a+b=4+1=5 \)
raw_answer:
(*) \( 2^{a+2}=64 \leftrightarrow 2^{a+2}=2^{6} \rightarrow a+2=6 \) Jadi \( a=4 \)
(*) \( 3^{b+2}=27 \leftrightarrow 3^{b+2}=3^{3} \rightarrow b+2=3 \) jadi \( b=1 \)
nilai \( a+b=4+1=5 \)

content: Di dalam kotak terdapat 2 bola biru, 6 bola merah, dan 2 bola putih. Jika diambil 8 bola tanpa pengembalian, maka peluang banyak bola merah yang terambil tiga kali banyak bola putih yang terambil adalah ....
answer:
Take 8 balls
let's say \( A= \) event of taking 6 red and 2 white balls
\[
\begin{array}{c}
n(A)=C_{6}^{6} \cdot C_{2}^{2}=1 \\
n(S)=C_{8}^{10}=45
\end{array}
\]

So \( P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{1}{45} \)

misalkan \( \mathrm{A}= \) kejadian terambil 6 merah dan 2 putih

n(S)=C_{8}^{10}=45
\end{array}
\]

Jadi \( P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{1}{45} \)

\end{array}
\]

Thus \( z= \pm 2 \)

content: Enam anak, 3 laki-laki dan 3 perempuan, duduk berjajar. Peluang 3 perempuan duduk berdampingan adalah ...
answer:
Given:
\( L = 3 \) children
\( P = 3 \) children
Question: 
What's the probability that 3 girls sit together? Let's assume that \( A = 3 \) girls sitting together. Since the 3 girls must sit together, the girls are considered as 1, so
\[
\begin{array}{l}
n(A)=4 ! \cdot 3 !=24 \times 6=144 \\
n(S)=6 !=720
\end{array}
\]

Hence, \( P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{144}{720}=\frac{1}{5} \)
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
\( \mathrm{L}=3 \) anak
\( \mathrm{P}=3 \) anak
Ditanyakan :
Peluang 3 anak perempuan duduk berdampingan ? Misalkan \( \mathrm{A}=3 \) anak perempuan yang berdampingan. Karena 3 anak perempuan harus duduk berdampingan, maka anak perempuan di anggap 1, sehingga
\[
\begin{array}{l}
n(A)=4 ! \cdot 3 !=24 \times 6=144 \\
n(S)=6 !=720
\end{array}
\]

Jadi \( P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{144}{720}=\frac{1}{5} \)

content: Jika \( x>0 \) dan \( y<0 \), manakah dari operasi hitung berikut ini yang selalu bemilai positif?
answer:
The information given is that:
\[
\boldsymbol{x} is greater than 0 \text { and } y is less than 0
\]

The question is: Which calculation results in a positive value.
\[
\begin{array}{l} 
x is greater than 0 \\
y is less than 0 \rightarrow -y is greater than 0+ \\
therefore, x-y is greater than 0
\end{array}
\]
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
\[
\boldsymbol{x}>0 \text { dan } y<0
\]

Ditanyakan : Operasi hitung yang bernilai positif.
\[
\begin{array}{l} 
x>0 \\
y<0 \rightarrow-y>0+ \\
x-y>0
\end{array}
\]

content: Di dalam kotak terdapat 3 bola biru, 6 bola merah, dan 2 bola putih. Jika diambil 7 bola tanpa pengembalian, maka peluang banyak bola merah yang terambil tiga kali banyak bola putih yang terambil adalah ....
answer:
Known:
3 blue balls
6 red balls
2 white balls
7 balls are drawn
Question:
What is the probability of drawing 3 blue, 3 red, and 1 white ball?
Let's say:
A: the event of drawing 3 blue balls, 3 red balls, and 1 white ball
\[
\begin{array}{c}
n(A)=C_{3}^{3} \cdot C_{3}^{6} \cdot C_{1}^{2}=1 \cdot 20 \cdot 2=40 \\
n(s)=C_{7}^{11}=330
\end{array}
\]

So, the probability
\[
P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{40}{330}=\frac{4}{33}
\]
raw_answer:
Diketahui :
3 bola biru
6 bola merah
2 bola putih
Di ambil 7 bola
Ditanyakan :
Peluang terambil 3 biru, 3 merah dan 1 putih?
Misalkan
A : kejadian terambil 3 bola biru, 3 bola merah dan 1 bola putih
\[
\begin{array}{c}
n(A)=C_{3}^{3} \cdot C_{3}^{6} \cdot C_{1}^{2}=1 \cdot 20 \cdot 2=40 \\
n(s)=C_{7}^{11}=330
\end{array}
\]

Jadi
\[
P(A)=\frac{n(A)}{n(S)}=\frac{40}{330}=\frac{4}{33}
\]
